Row.Text: Astrologist Mona Megistus
The Great Astrologist

Every 5 Turn, all of[ICON_Gold]Gold balance will turn into[ICON_Science]Science by a 2:1 ratio. The civilization with highest[ICON_Science]Science(except Mona herself) will receive these[ICON_Gold]Gold. [NEWLINE]Every Technology done researching will return[ICON_Gold]Gold, by half of[ICON_Science]Science the Technology cost. [NEWLINE]Culture Bomb adjacent tiles when completing a Campus. Campus district's [ICON_SCIENCE] Science adjacency bonus provides [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production as well. Free Technology "Astrology" and "Celestial Navigation". Has extra initial vision.
Mona's unique Support unit. Can see through features and terrains. Provide adjacent ally units with Defensive[ICON_Strength]strength bonus. Provide +1[ICON_Range]to adjacent Seige units.
Temple of the Star Latitudes
A building unique to Mona. Comes with palace. +1[ICON_GreatScientist]Great Scientist Point.
阿斯托洛吉斯·莫娜·梅姬斯图斯
伟大的占星术士

每5回合，国库[ICON_Gold]金币将按2:1的比例转换为[ICON_Science]科技值，[ICON_Science]科技值最高的文明(除莫娜自身外)会收到这笔[ICON_Gold]资金。每研究完成一个科技，就获得其所消耗的[ICON_Science]科技值二分之一的[ICON_Gold]金币。[NEWLINE]建成学院区域时施放文化炸弹，学院区域的[ICON_SCIENCE]科技值相邻加成也可提供[ICON_PRODUCTION]生产力。[NEWLINE]自动获得“占星术”和“天文导航”科技。游戏开始时获得额外视野。
占星术士
莫娜的特色支援单位。拥有可穿越地形和地貌的增强视野。相邻的友方单位在防御时获得[ICON_Strength]战斗力加成。能够为相邻的攻城单位提供+1[ICON_Range]射程。
星纬殿堂
莫娜的特色建筑，随宫殿附赠。+1[ICON_GreatScientist]大科学家点数。

偉大的占星術士
